ItemEvolution.__description__:
Represents the evolution of an item over time or through specific events.

Attributes:
    stages (List[Dict[str, Any]]): List of evolution stages with their properties.
    current_stage (int): Index of the current evolution stage.
    evolution_trigger (Optional[str]): Condition that triggers evolution to the next stage.
ItemEvolution.stages__description__: List of evolution stages with their properties
ItemEvolution.current_stage__description__: Index of the current evolution stage
ItemEvolution.evolution_trigger__description__: Condition that triggers evolution to the next stage
